65.eng-name: Prophetic Commentary on the Qur'an (Tafseer of the Prophet (pbuh))

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "Moses was a shy man, and that is what the Statement of Allah means: 'O you who believe Be not like those who annoyed Moses, but Allah proved his innocence of that which they alleged and he was honorable in Allah's Sight

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِهِ {لاَ تَكُونُوا كَالَّذِينَ آذَوْا مُوسَى}
chapter.eng-name: "Be you not like those who annoyed Mūsa (Moses)." (V.33:69)
